content.description: The crux is near the top of the route. This has crimpy goodness!
content.location:
Look for the stainless steel route plaque with the name "Wagon Train." It is to the right of

Nepalese Seamstress

and to the left of

Under Promise Over Deliver

.

content.description: This is a MIXED route (trad/sport). The crux is 3/4th up the route.
content.protection: Bring #0.1 - #2 and clip 4 bolts to chain anchors.
content.location:
Look for the stainless steel route plaque with the name "Under Promise Over Deliver." It is right of

Wagon Train

and left of

Anapatasati (Mindfulness of Breathing)

.

content.description: Chimney climb! The crux is mental at the top of the chimney when crossing over.
content.location:
Look for the stainless steel route plaque with the name "Through the Belly of Buddha." It is to the right of

Samadhi (Mental Discipline)

and to the left of

Blistering Brutal Buddha Bulges

.

content.description:
The crux is near the top of the route. It gets slightly thin! Its anchors are shared with

Spicy MoMo

.
content.location:
Look for the stainless steel route plaque with the name "Thali." It will be right of

Livelihood

and left of

Spicy MoMo

.

content.description:
The crux is halfway up the route. The start is a bit bouldery as well. Its anchors are shared with

Thali

.
content.location: Look for the stainless steel route plaque with the name "Spicy MoMo." It will be right of Thali and left of Dal Bhat (coming soon).

content.description: The crux is getting over the bulge roughly 20 feet up.
content.location:
Look for the stainless steel route plaque with the name "Sila (Ethical Conduct)." It will be right of

Karuna (Compassion)

and left of

Panna (Wisdom)

.

content.description: The crux is roughly halfway up the route.
content.location:
Look for the stainless steel route plaque with the name "Samadhi (Mental Discipline)." It will be right of

Breakfast Burritos with Buddha

and left of

Through The Belly of Buddha

.

content.description: The crux is toward the top of the route. High step and finish strong.
content.location:
Look for the stainless steel route plaque with the name "R&B (Rhythm and Buddha)." It is to the right of

Path to Enlightenment

and to the left of

Nepalese Seamstress

.

content.description: The crux is roughly 15-20 feet up with climbing on your toes. You cannot see the anchors from the ground, but they are up there. This is a perfect climb to learn on.
content.location:
This is the third route most western route on the Buddha Wall's Enlightened Side. Look for the stainless steel route plaque with the name "Path to Enlightenment" on it. It will be to the right of

Love Based Motivation

and to the left of

R&B (Rhythm & Buddha)

.

content.description: The crux is transitioning onto the giant flake.
content.location:
Look for the stainless steel route plaque with the name "Panna (Wisdom)." It will be right of

Sila (Ethical Conduct)

and left of

Livelihood

.

content.description: This is a MIXED route (trad/sport). The crux is about 15 feet up where the only bolt is located.
content.protection: Bring #0.1 - #4, X2 #0.75 is useful. Clip 1 bolt to chain anchors.
content.location:
Look for the stainless steel route plaque with the name "The Noble Eightfold Path." It will be to the right of

Kālō Lakīra (Black Streak)

and to the left of

Breakfast Burritos with Buddha

.

content.description: The crux is toward the top of the route.
content.location:
Look for the stainless steel route plaque with the name "Nepalese Seamstress." It is to the right of

R&B (Rhythm and Buddha)

and to the left of

Wagon Train

.

content.description: The crux is halfway up the route pulling over the biggest bulge.
content.location: Coming soon!

content.description: The crux is at the top just before the anchors.
content.location:
Look for the stainless steel route plaque with the name "Namaste, Sundara." It will be right of Dal Bhat (coming soon) and left of

The Honest Wood Cutter

.

content.description: This is a trad route. The crux is at the very beginning pulling over the first bulge.
content.protection: Bring #0.1 - #3. There are chain anchors at the top.
content.location:
Look for the stainless steel route plaque with the name "Mutton Belly Button." It will be right of

Fluttering Silk

and left of

Nepalese New Year

(coming soon).

content.description: The crux is at the very beginning.
content.location: This is the Western most route on the Buddha Wall's Enlightened Side (south face).

content.description: The crux is 3/4ths to the top with a weird swing to the right. Be careful lowering.
content.location:
Down toward the western end of the Enlightened Side of the Buddha Wall, look for the stainless steel route plaque titled, "Love Based Motivation." It should be to the right of

Lumbini

and to the left of

Path to Enlightenment

.

content.description: This is a MIXED route (trad/sport). The crux is transitioning into the crack and placing your first piece of trad gear.
content.protection: Bring #0.75 - #4. Clip 1 bolt to ring anchors.
content.location:
Look for the stainless steel route plaque with the name "Livelihood." It will be right of

Panna (Wisdom)

and left of

Thali

.

content.description: The crux is in the black streak!
content.location:
Look for the stainless steel route plaque with the name "Kālō Lakīra (Black Streak)." It is to the right of

Anapatasati (Mindfulness of Breathing)

and to the left of

The Noble Eightfold Path

.

content.description: The crux is roughly 20 feet off the ground.
content.location:
Look for the stainless steel route plaque with the name "Karuna (Compassion)." It will be right of

Blistering Brutal Buddha Bulges

and left of

Sila (Ethical Conduct)

.

content.description: The crux is at the beginning. It requires high feet!
content.location:
Look for the stainless steel route plaque with the name "The Honest Wood Cutter." It will be right of

Namaste, Sundara

and left of

Fluttering Silk

.

content.description: The crux is roughly halfway up the route.
content.location:
Look for the stainless steel route plaque with the name "Fluttering Silk." It will be right of

The Honest Wood Cutter

and left of

Mutton Belly Button

.

content.description: The crux is roughly halfway up the route. This route was given 4 stars by several people.
content.location:
Look for the stainless steel route plaque with the name "Breakfast Burritos with Buddha." It should be right of

The Noble Eightfold Path

and left of

Mental Discipline (Samadhi)

.

content.description: The crux is both halfway up the route and roughly 3/4th up the route. Hang on tightly!
content.location: Coming soon!

content.description: The crux is 3/4th up the route.
content.location:
Look for the stainless steel route plaque with the name "Anapatasati (Mindfulness of Breathing)." It is right of

Under Promise Over Deliver

and left of

Kālō Lakīra (Black Streak)

.
